EmailTemplate.name: 18-Smart Cities-City as a platform-Email-Nurture SmartCity-T003GY.Email 2 Ioc vi
EmailTemplate.subject: Use IoT and analytics to make your city smarter
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Video Orchestrate a brighter future for your city To unlock their digitization potential, cities will need to use data from millions of endpoints to deliver services that improve quality of life. See how our Integrated Operations Center service <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QUwT8dj5whs?did=d00000000189&utm_campaign=city_as_a_platform&utm_source=nurture&utm_medium=email&utm_content=email2:ioc-video&utm_term=smartcity]]> can help you quickly build a brighter future for your city by using real-time IoT data to orchestrate operations such as traffic, water quality and pollution monitoring. © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia.
Nokia: Karaportti 3, 2610 Espoo, Finland Contact Us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> · Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> · Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Twitter}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Linkedin}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Facebook}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Youtube}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Blog}}]]> This message has been sent to you because of your relationship with Nokia Networks or its third party licensors who are trusted partners of Nokia.
